title: BRIEF-SPAR Group Says JPmorgan Now Holds 5,80% Of Total Issued Ordinary Share Capital Of Co
text:
BRIEF-SPAR Group Says JPmorgan Now Holds 5,80% Of Total Issued Ordinary Share Capital Of Co

Stock Markets 11 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 09:54)

© Reuters. BRIEF-SPAR Group Says JPmorgan Now Holds 5,80% Of Total Issued Ordinary Share Capital Of Co Oct 18 (Reuters) - SPAR Group Ltd : * NOTICE OF AN ACQUISITION OF A BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN SPAR SECURITIES * JPMORGAN NOW HOLDS 5,80% OF TOTAL ISSUED ORDINARY SHARE CAPITAL OF COMPANY

BRIEF-SPAR Group Says JPmorgan Now Holds 5,80% Of Total Issued Ordinary Share Capital Of Co
